ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed
des: "We love crab meat and this is a wonderful crab salad for summer. Easy to make."
ins:
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside.
In a medium bowl, combine peas, imitation crab, bacon, mayonnaise, and onion powder. Mix thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate until serving.
